front.title: The Use of G-IKEv2 for Multicast Router Key Management

abstract.t: The G-IKEv2 key management protocol protects group traffic, usually in the form of IP multicast communications between a set of network devices. This memo defines extensions to G-IKEv2 allowing it to protect the communications of routing protocols using a one-to-many or many-to-many communications model.
